definitions.text: the part of the body between the neck and the upper arm
a cut of meat including the upper joint of the foreleg
a ball-and-socket joint between the head of the humerus and a cavity of the scapula
the part of a garment that covers or fits over the shoulder
examples: an ornamental gold braid on the shoulder of his uniform

definitions.text: a narrow edge of land (usually unpaved) along the side of a road
examples: the car pulled off onto the shoulder
He shouldered his way into the crowd

definitions.text: carry a burden, either real or metaphoric
